title: Conflict Resolution
verses: Matthew 5:23–24 (WEB) — “First be reconciled to your brother.”
Romans 12:18 (WEB) — “As far as it is up to you, be at peace with all.”
Matthew 18:15 (WEB) — “Go to your brother alone and show his fault.”
Ephesians 4:32 (WEB) — “Be kind… forgiving one another, as God also in Christ forgave you.”
body: Seek peace promptly and humbly. Own your part, speak truth in love, and aim for restoration. Forgiveness doesn’t erase wisdom—set healthy boundaries where needed.
prayer: God of peace, make me a reconciler. Give me courage to go, humility to listen, and grace to forgive. Heal what is broken. Amen.
